name: proxcam-attendance-system
description: ProxCam - Enhanced CAMU Attendance Management System with 20+ User Support

scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf frontend/build && rm -rf backend/dist && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf frontend/node_modules && rm -rf backend/node_modules
scripts.setup: npm run install-all && echo 'Setup complete! Run npm run dev to start development server'

author: ProxCam Team
